definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中国医疗系统的弊病绝不仅仅局限于美容整形外科。

sentences.english: The plastic surgery industry has been amply augmented.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，整形外科手术业得到了长足的发展。

sentences.english: This is the website of the North West Orthopaedic Trainees Association.
sentences.chinese: 这是西北整形外科实习协会的网站。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the operative treatment of verrucous nevus using plastic surgical techniques.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨整形外科手术方法在疣状痣治疗的应用。

sentences.english: Sunchon transverse mode Plastic Surgery is taken to hospital admission.
sentences.chinese: 顺天横模整形外科是采取入院。

sentences.english: Gillies saw the plastic surgeon as a sculptor.
sentences.chinese: 吉利斯把整形外科医生看作是雕塑家。

sentences.english: Plastic surgery may eventually provide a way for people to cheat themselves into looking younger.
sentences.chinese: 整形外科所能提供的只是使人变得年轻的谎言。

sentences.english: This is the website for Shanghai Shiguang Orthopaedics Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 这是上海时光整形外科医院的网站。
他对整形外科是个外行。

sentences.english: They are the two major advances in orthopedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 这些是整形外科医学的两项重大进展。

pinyin: zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1

definition: department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
non-surgical cosmetic procedure (injection of Botox, hyaluronic acid etc)
surgeon/as opposed to physician 內科醫生|内科医生[nei4 ke1 yi1 sheng1], who works primarily by administering drugs
